solution_line_template: Jakies island produced ten times as many bananas as the nearby island, a total of {jakies_multiplier}*{nearby_island_produce} = <<{jakies_multiplier}*{nearby_island_produce}={jakies_island_produce}>>{jakies_island_produce} bananas.
Together, the two islands produced {jakies_island_produce}+{nearby_island_produce}= <<{jakies_island_produce}+{nearby_island_produce}={total_produce}>>{total_produce} bananas in that year.
